Detailed Description

SlimTcpServerSocket is a class to encapsulate a TCP server socket.

void SlimTcpServerSocket::setConnectionHandler (  SlimTcpConnectionHandler *  connection_handler  ) 
 

Set a connection handler. When a incoming connection from a client occurs, onConnection() method of connection_handler will be called
